TableView.name: VIEW_SMP3_PMM
TableView.afterCreate:
CREATE OR REPLACE FORCE VIEW "EASYVIEW"."VIEW_SMP3_PMM" AS
WITH regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
pmms AS
(SELECT PMM.NOME AS pmm, PMM.INICIO, PMM.FIM FROM PMM),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d, pmms p),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo AS
(SELECT data,
hora,
pmm,
cn,
msc,
scv,
cham,
okt,
inv
FROM view_msc_vinculo_smp3
WHERE codigo != 'NID'),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS Regional,
Tab.PMM,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OKT, 0))), '0') AS Smp3_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.CHAM, 0) - NVL(Tab.SCV, 0) - NVL(Tab.INV, 0))), '0') AS SMP3_B
FROM view_msc_cn_ativo_smp3 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL ,
PMM pmm,
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
AND (Tab.HORA BETWEEN pmm.INICIO AND pmm.FIM)
AND tab.msc = b.msc
AND tab.cn = b.cn
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
AND b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME,
Tab.PMM
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
reg.pmm,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP3_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP3_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A = '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP3_B != '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A = '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND((dados.Smp3_A * 100 / dados.SMP3_B), 2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS smp3,
nvl(smp3_a,'0') smp3_a,
nvl(smp3_b,'0') smp3_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.Regional(+)
AND reg.pmm = dados.PMM(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.pmm,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE WHEN dados_finais.smp3 != '0,00' AND TO_NUMBER(dados_finais.smp3) > 100 THEN
'100,00'
ELSE
REPLACE(dados_finais.smp3,'.',',')
END AS SMP3,
smp3_a as smp_a,
smp3_b as smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3;
TableView.userDefinedSQL:
CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW VIEW_SMP3_PMM
AS
WITH regionais AS
(SELECT REGIONAL.NOME AS regional, regional.* FROM REGIONAL WHERE indicador_smp = 'T'),
dias AS
(SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE) data FROM dual
UNION ALL
SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE - Level) FROM dual CONNECT BY Level < 15
),
pmms AS
(SELECT PMM.NOME AS pmm, PMM.INICIO, PMM.FIM FROM PMM),
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms AS
(SELECT * FROM regionais r, dias d, pmms p),
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo AS
(SELECT data,
hora,
pmm,
cn,
msc,
scv,
cham,
okt,
inv
FROM view_msc_vinculo_smp3
WHERE codigo != 'NID'),
dados_x_pmm AS
(SELECT TRUNC(Tab.DATA) AS Data,
Reg.NOME AS Regional,
Tab.PMM,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.OKT, 0))), '0') AS Smp3_A,
NVL(TO_CHAR(SUM(NVL(Tab.CHAM, 0) - NVL(Tab.SCV, 0) - NVL(Tab.INV, 0))), '0') AS SMP3_B
FROM view_msc_cn_ativo_smp3 b,
dados_traducao_sem_vinculo Tab
INNER JOIN Cn Cn ON Cn.Nome = Tab.CN
INNER JOIN Metricview.Rel_Regional_Cod_Nacional Reg_Cod ON Reg_Cod.Id_Cn = Cn.Id_Cn
INNER JOIN regionais Reg ON Reg_Cod.Id_Regional = Reg.ID_REGIONAL ,
PMM pmm,
dias dias
WHERE TRUNC(dias.data) = TRUNC(Tab.DATA)
AND (Tab.HORA BETWEEN pmm.INICIO AND pmm.FIM)
AND tab.msc = b.msc
AND tab.cn = b.cn
AND to_date(TO_CHAR(tab.data,'MM/yyyy'),'MM/yyyy') = b.periodo
AND b.status = 'T'
GROUP BY TRUNC(Tab.DATA),
Reg.NOME,
Tab.PMM
),
dados_finais AS
(SELECT reg.data,
reg.regional,
reg.pmm,
CASE
WHEN dados.SMP3_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A != '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP3_B = '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A = '0'
THEN '0,00'
WHEN dados.SMP3_B != '0'
AND dados.Smp3_A = '0'
THEN '0,00'
ELSE NVL(trim(TO_CHAR(ROUND((dados.Smp3_A * 100 / dados.SMP3_B), 2),'999990D99')), '0,00')
END AS smp3,
nvl(smp3_a,'0') smp3_a,
nvl(smp3_b,'0') smp3_b
FROM dados_x_pmm dados,
regionais_x_dias_x_pmms reg
WHERE reg.data = dados.Data(+)
AND reg.regional = dados.Regional(+)
AND reg.pmm = dados.PMM(+)
)
SELECT dados_finais.data,
dados_finais.pmm,
dados_finais.regional,
CASE WHEN dados_finais.smp3 != '0,00' AND TO_NUMBER(dados_finais.smp3) > 100 THEN
'100,00'
ELSE
REPLACE(dados_finais.smp3,'.',',')
END AS SMP3,
smp3_a as smp_a,
smp3_b as smp_b
FROM dados_finais
ORDER BY 1,2,3
TableView.layoutSQL: Select * From dual
